casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John David WATSON. No. 39P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 9, 2016. Marie Hare Mobley, Smithfield, Attorney at Law, for Watson, John David. Richard G. Sowerby, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of February 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of February 2016."
